item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "In the end these things matter most: How well did you love? How fully did you live? How deeply did you let go?" -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Lisa add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Lisa add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?" -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Lisa add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "It is not often that someone comes along who is a true friend and a good writer." -- E.B. White

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Constant use had not worn ragged the fabric of their friendship." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller
